name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
synopsis: Prepare to jump into food-filled fun in Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2. Join Flint Lockwood and his friends on their journey to save Swallow Falls and discover new friends, Foodimals, along the way. Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2 is packed with fast and energetic puzzle-based gameplay that players of all ages will love.
